title: Summer Salt Turn
original_name: サマー・ソルト・ターン
sinopse:
Yuuichirou Mizuno was a child prodigy in swimming that hit his peak with his bigger than average body size. However, he stopped growing, leading to no improvements. He gave up on swimming, but with the help and encouragement from his friends, he started to get back at it.

(Source: Pika Édition, translated)
